text:
Today reached restriction that lead to the following feedback:

Via the API it is currently not possible to decide in a webhook block if i want to Include all contact properties or a customized request body... furthermore it would nevertheless great when i choose customize request body in the UI that also there the portalId, objectTypeId and maybe the objectType will be sent by default.

do you happen to have this on the screen or will the feature not be available?
I hope you find the feedback helpful and are able to put it into action.

best regards
Lukas
